content:
You've come to the right place! I've got plenty of delicious and protein-packed meal ideas featuring chicken breast and salmon. Here are some mouth-watering recipes to get you started:

**Chicken Breast Recipes**

1. **Lemon Garlic Chicken Breast with Quinoa and Broccoli**: Marinate chicken breast in a mixture of lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil, then grill or bake until cooked through. Serve with quinoa and steamed broccoli.
2. **Chicken Fajitas with Avocado Salsa**: Sauté diced chicken breast with bell peppers, onions, and fajita seasoning. Serve with whole wheat tortillas, avocado salsa, and a side of brown rice.
3. **Chicken and Mushroom Creamy Pasta**: Cook chicken breast with mushrooms, garlic, and onions in a creamy sauce made with Greek yogurt and parmesan cheese. Serve with whole wheat pasta and a side salad.
4. **Korean-Style Chicken Breast with Gochujang Glaze**: Marinate chicken breast in a spicy gochujang glaze, then grill or bake until cooked through. Serve with roasted vegetables and brown rice.
5. **Chicken and Spinach Stuffed Bell Peppers**: Stuff bell peppers with a mixture of cooked chicken breast, spinach, feta cheese, and quinoa, and bake until tender.

**Salmon Recipes**

1. **Grilled Salmon with Lemon Dill Sauce and Roasted Asparagus**: Grill salmon fillets and serve with a bright and citrusy lemon dill sauce and roasted asparagus.
2. **Baked Salmon with Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl**: Season salmon fillets with cumin and chili powder, then bake until cooked through. Serve with a quinoa and black bean bowl, topped with diced avocado and salsa.
3. **Salmon and Avocado Sushi Rolls**: Make your own sushi at home with salmon sashimi, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in whole wheat nori seaweed.
4. **Salmon and Spinach Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms**: Fill Portobello mushroom caps with a mixture of cooked salmon, spinach, and feta cheese, and bake until golden brown.
5. **Pan-Seared Salmon with Capers and Brown Rice**: Pan-sear salmon fillets with capers, garlic, and lemon, and serve with a side of brown rice and steamed green beans.

These recipes are not only delicious but also packed with protein, fiber, and healthy fats to keep you fueled and satisfied. Enjoy!
